title: NA player moved to Australia looking for a dedicated OCE team for 2017
body:
Have played since s1 but never got really heavily into ranked games. 

S1- didn't do ranked 
S2 - gold under 50 games 
s3 - plat under 100 games
s4 - gold under 50 games
s5- didn't play much LoL at all because I had just moved to Australia and was focused on getting a job, new PC, etc. 
S6- plat in under 100 games, literally got back into LoL about 1 and 1/2 months ago

I got to plat here in oceanic mostly supporting because I couldn't bother with waiting for queue and would always fill. Previous Seasons my main was always mid/jg as these are the positions that can control the map and the game the most. I have played and own every champ except Jhin and Illaoi and  am confident in playing at a bare minimum of gold skill level with all of them. Over 4k normal games under my belt, ~ 2200-2000 Win/loss. 

I would be willing to fill any position a team needs and would dedicate myself to strictly working on champs to fill that position. Feel free to add me in game.

Age- 25
Living in western Sydney.
Willing to use any form of voicechat and available UTC +10:00 any time after 6:00 pm every night except Tuesday. 

Thanks and if you have questions just ask.

replies.body: idm playing serious for Season 7 Pref normal ranked but yeah i wanna main mid eventually, However im Main Sup,

Ahem.

You fucked up. Just play in NA from here, pings not that bad, game is also more about the game, less tryhard pissing it 24/7 regardless, I know sometimes happens there but not every game. 

NA: "I'm just trolling guys" - "Yeah whatever, its a game made for fun"
OCE: "I'm just trolling guys" - (10 min) "WHAT THE FUCK YOUR SO BAD GUT GOOD EVEN A SEVEN OLD COOD PLY BETTER. THAN YOU YOUR FUCKING TRASH"

Though I suppose is kinda fun when you have this 12-year-old call you seven and have really bad spelling and grammar when they do it.
